content:
I'm getting that dreaded "None of the codings provided are in the value set" error:

None of the codings provided are in the value set 'SPL Document Codes' (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/spl/ValueSet/splDocumentCodes), and a coding from this value set is required) (codes = http://loinc.org#34391-3)
None of the codings provided are in the value set 'SPL Section Codes' (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/spl/ValueSet/splSectionCodes), and a coding from this value set is required) (codes = http://loinc.org#34089-3)

When I look at the value set expansion, all of the codes I'm using are there, so I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong or how I can fix these errors.
Have you wiped out your tx cache?
trying that now.. i will hate if that is the answer. :)
Jean Duteau has marked this topic as resolved.
